channel.title: Cache wont load on windows 7
channel.description:
ok i am using a PI based server right
since the server cache updater doesnt work i just manually gonna upload the cace and client on the site ok now the cache works for me on windows xp, the background everything is fine but i sent my cache and client to my friend cause were making a server together and my mate has windows 7 and when he runs it he gets this error on a cmd black box when he loads the client and this is the error code on the cmd black box
[code]Myserverherescape is loading.. java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open<Native Method> at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init><Unknown Source> at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init><Unknown Source> at Update.unZipFile<Update.java:53> at Update.<init><Update.java:29> at client.streamLoaderForName<client.java:4457> at client.startUp<client.java:8486> at RSApplet.run<RSApplet.java:33> at client.run<client.java:5759> at java.lang.Thread.run<Unknown Source>[/code]
so whats the problem aye? theres nuffin to do with a zip because my cache works on win xp and i sent the same cache i used to my friend which he uses win 7 and plus i dont have a zip file in my cache?
any suggestions?

item.title: Cache wont load on windows 7
item.dc:creator: @rspsftw rspsftw
item.description:
@rspsftw wrote:

ok i am using a PI based server right

since the server cache updater doesnt work i just manually gonna upload the cace and client on the site
ok now the cache works for me on windows xp, the background everything is fine
but i sent my cache and client to my friend cause were making a server together
and my mate has windows 7 and when he runs it he gets this error on a cmd black box when he loads the client
and this is the error code on the cmd black box

Myserverherescape is loading.. java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open<Native Method> at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init><Unknown Source> at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init><Unknown Source> at Update.unZipFile<Update.java:53> at Update.<init><Update.java:29> at client.streamLoaderForName<client.java:4457> at client.startUp<client.java:8486> at RSApplet.run<RSApplet.java:33> at client.run<client.java:5759> at java.lang.Thread.run<Unknown Source>

so whats the problem aye?
theres nuffin to do with a zip because my cache works on win xp and i sent the same cache i used to my friend which he uses win 7 and plus i dont have a zip file in my cache?

any suggestions?
